item.title: Regional Finalists
item.description: WRCCDC is proud to announce the winners of the WRCCDC Qualifiers 2021! The following 8 teams will move onto the regional. The teams are listed in ranking, based on their total team score.

item.title: Registered Teams
item.description: We are pleased to announce the teams that are registered for the WRCCDC 2021 Qualifier. We have 18 teams registered this year. See you at the online round!

item.title: November Training Session 1
item.description: The Staff of the Western Regional Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition is happy to welcome Bluespawn as our training presenter during out 1st Fall Training Session.

item.title: November Invitational Registration
item.description: <hr> Please use the form below to sign up for the Virtual Fall Invitational coming up in November. If the form does not appear, please click on the link below.

item.title: Team Registration
item.description: <hr> The central registration process for the 2021 CCDC season opens Sept 1, 2020.

item.title: Season Dates
item.description: <hr> We are pleased to announce the dates for the WRCCDC 2020-2021 season! We wanted to announce these dates early to make sure people had enough time to plan.
